evoter.server.dao.test

Class TestAnswerDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.dao.test.TestAnswerDAO

  • @ContextConfiguration(locations="classpath:applicationContextTest.xml")
@Transactional
@TransactionConfiguration(defaultRollback=true)
public class TestAnswerDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Make test cases for AnswerDAO
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) evoter.share.dao.AnswerDAO answerDAO
      Create a AnswerDAOImpl instance

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestAnswerDAO() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void test_deleteByAnswerText()
      Test AnswerDAO.deleteByAnswerText(String)
      Delete answers having answer text="My brother" in answer table and expect returning an empty array when searching all answers with answer text="My brother"
      void test_deleteById()
      Test AnswerDAO.deleteById(long)
      Delete an answer ID=8 in answer table and expect returning an empty list when searching answer ID=8 again
      void test_deleteByQuestionId()
      Test AnswerDAO.deleteByQuestionId(long)
      Delete answers of question ID=4 in answer table and expect returning an empty list when searching all answers of question ID=4
      void test_findAll()
      Test for AnswerDAO.findAll()
      Select all Answer in answer table
      Expect returning a list of Answer
      void test_findByAnswerText()
      Test for AnswerDAO.findByAnswerText(String)
      Search answers with answer text condition="Two hours." and expect returning not empty list
      Search answers with answer text condition="anything else" and expect returning an empty list
      void test_findById()
      Test AnswerDAO.findById(long)
      Search all Answer by id=4 in answer table
      Expect returning a list of Answer
      void test_findByProperty()
      Test AnswerDAO.findByProperty(String[], Object[])
      Search answers answer ID=4 and question ID=3 in answer table
      Expect returning a not null value
      void test_findByQuestionId()
      Test AnswerDAO.findByQuestionId(long)
      Search Answer by question id=4 in answer table
      Expect returning a list of Answer
      void test_insert()
      Test for AnswerDAO.insert(Answer)
      Create a new Answer and insert it to answer table
      AnswerDAO.insert(Answer) will return a generated answer ID.
      void test_update()
      Test for AnswerDAO.update(Answer)
      Change Answer by answer text of answer ID=2
      Expect the change are updated when searching answer ID=2;

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • test_insert

        public void test_insert()
        Test for AnswerDAO.insert(Answer)
        Create a new Answer and insert it to answer table
        AnswerDAO.insert(Answer) will return a generated answer ID. Expect returning a answer object when search answer with the generated id

      • test_update

        public void test_update()
        Test for AnswerDAO.update(Answer)

        Expect the change are updated when searching answer ID=2;
